jsx.http.rpc
Class HttpRemote

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.http.rpc.HttpRemote
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLHttpRemote
public abstract class HttpRemote
extends Disposable

An abstract base class for HTTP remote objects.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

          An abstract base class for an HTTP serialization context.

Method Detail

call

protected abstract java.lang.Object call(java.lang.String url,
                                         ArrayLike<?> args)

Calls a remote method with the current instance.

Subclasses should provide a concrete implementation.

Parameters:
url - A HTTP resource locator of the remote method.
args - An array of arguments for the invocation.
Returns:
The value returned from the invocation. The value can only be a number, string or ObjectLike.
Since:
1.0

number

public static final java.lang.Number number(HttpRemote base,
                                            Index<java.lang.Number> idx)

Gets the value of the number field of an HTTP remote object.

Parameters:
base - A HTTP remote object to get the number field from.
idx - The index specifying the number field.
Returns:
The number value of the desired field.
Since:
1.0

number

public static final java.lang.Number number(HttpRemote base,
                                            Index<java.lang.Number> idx,
                                            java.lang.Number val)

Sets value of the number field of an HTTP remote object.

Parameters:
base - A HTTP remote object to set number field to.
idx - The index specifying the number field.
val - The new number value to set.
Returns:
The new value of the number field.
